name: refreshing

C1 making you feel less hot or tired: There's nothing more refreshing on a hot day than a cold beer.
C1 pleasantly different and interesting: It's a refreshing change to see a losing team shaking hands and still smiling after a match.
More examplesFewer examplesa lively wine with a refreshing lemon fruitinessA cool fruit juice would be nice and refreshing.I find a swim very refreshing on a hot day.The show was refreshing in the liveliness and openness of its debate.The script has a refreshing spontaneity and sparkle.
